name: PanasonicComfortCloud
0:
”Alexa, turn on living.”
”Alexa, turn off bedroom.”
”Alexa, set living to heat.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Control your Panasonic-branded Heating & Cooling products via Alexa. In order to use these functions, you will need to download Panasonic Comfort Cloud App, create your own account, and register the product to the server by using the App.
You can control ON or OFF, operation modes and temperature settings.

Note
- You can enjoy the service with either the Wireless LAN built-in models or the Wireless LAN ready models which can be connected to internet through optional Wireless LAN adaptor. Optional Wireless LAN adaptor can be purchased separately. 

- In order to enjoy the service, the product must be in an environment where it can be controlled through Panasonic Comfort Cloud App. 

- Only your Panasonic Comfort Cloud account can be linked to the this skill.

Try saying
"Alexa, turn on living."
"Alexa, turn off bedroom."
"Alexa, set living to heat. "
